charges.charge_description: 18:641 and 2 PUBLIC MONEY, PROPERTY OR RECORDS - SOCIAL SECURITY BENEFITS CHECKS(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 16 months. Deft shall report on 2/2/98 to the institution to be designated by the BOP. Upon release from imprisonment, deft shall be on super rel for a term of 2 yrs w/drug testing. Amo unt of restitution &; payees as follows: $39,574.00 - payee US Social Security Admin; $466.00 - J.C. Penney Co.; $2,766.80 - Sears, Roebuck &; Co.; $228.19 - Roaman's; $3,190.62 - Citibank Mastercard; $8,228.65 - Merc antile Bank Visa; $1,606.96 - Chevy Chase Bank Mastercard; $1,585.01 - Wells Fargo Bank Mastercard; $17,843.00 - US IRS. Restitution to be paid in full &; payments made payable &; sent to the Clerk of Ct. If there are multiple payees, an y pymt not made directly to a payee shall be divided proportionately among the payees. Special assessment ordered in the amt of $250.00.

charges.charge_description: 18:641 and 2 PUBLIC MONEY, PROPERTY OR RECORDS - SOCIAL SECURITY BENEFITS CHECKS(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Deft is hereby committed to the custody of the BOP for a term of 12 months. Deft shall report on 2/2/98 to the institution to be designated by the BOP. Upon release from imprisonment, deft shall be on super rel for a term of 2 yrs w/drug testing. Amo unt of restitution &; payees as follows: $39,574.00 - payee US Social Security Administration; $466.00 - J.C. Penney Co.; $2,766.80 - Sears, Roebuck &; Co.; $228.19 - Roaman's; $3,190.62 - Citibank Mastercard; $8,228. 65 - Mercantile Bank Visa; $1,606.96 - Chevy Chase Bank Mastercard; $1,585.01 - Wells Fargo Bank Mastercard. Restitution to be paid in full &; pymts shall be made payable &; sent to the Clerk of Ct. If there are multiple payees, any pymt not made directly to a payee shall be divided proportionately among the payees names. Special assessment ordered in the amt of $150.00.
